name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course engages students in the readings and discussions on issues of multiculturalism and refugees in the global context. It aims at preparing students to develop critical awareness of justice and equality through achieving a better understanding of these issues. Students, then, are further expected to be better able to be aware of and question the accepted norms that they encounter in their everyday lives.
